text: Marcos Roberto Gómes (born January 26, 1994 in Paraná, Brazil) is a professional Brazilian footballer who currently plays for Potros UAEM ==References== Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Brazilian footballers Category:Brazilian expatriate footballers Category:Potros UAEM footballers Category:Ascenso MX players Category:Brazilian expatriate sportspeople in Mexico Category:Expatriate footballers in Mexico Category:People from Paraná (state) Category:Association footballers not categorized by position
title: Marcos Roberto Gómes
